idea:
Predecto is a product which deals with Predective Artificial Intelligence solution for safety and success. Predecto is an AI and Deep Learning based video analytics solution over edge and cloud. Predecto is backed by 100% fail-safe certified lab-validation making the solution unchallengeable in most use cases.

Predecto AI and deep learning algorithm helps people and companies watch pertinent video and enable actionable insights. Predecto predictive analytics, forward-looking insights and more intelligent decision-making responses in real time helps you avoid risks and spot opportunities.
name: PWA LAB LLP
